comment.author: 15828730@N05
comment._content: Now this looks like a Burgess-Dunne "Aerohydroplane" (floatplane) configured for land use. Possibly the Burgess-Dunne No. 3? That was the wheeled land version that flew out of North Island, San Diego.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
